entry.title: Monday night: A few showers. Low zero.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few showers beginning early this evening and ending near midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A few flurries changing to a few rain showers near noon. Risk of thunderstorms in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the morning. High plus 2. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 17 April 2023
